Rion:

Rion wasn't really upset, he just didn't want to admit that when it came to 
certain battle techniques Diana, a princess with absolutely no training in 
that particular field, could best him. Well, maybe he was a little upset...

"I am not!"

Rion sighed as he lay back in the soft sand. It felt kinda soft and smooth 
beneath his feet and against his feathers. It was kinda nice. He always 
liked playing in the dirt, especially when it was raining:

"My instructor, Swordance, used to say the same thing. You knew her, right? 
Tall, kinda looked like a bug."

Rion rocked back playfully when Diana bumped him. But he was a little 
worried too. Well, it didn't help if both of them were sad and depressed. 
They'd end up frying out here!

"They're probably in space... b-battling. Yeah, they're fighting those guys 
that attacked us. Everyone's fine. They'll come and get us as soon as 
possible!"

Rion jumped to his feet and extended a hand to Diana:

"C'mon! Let's explore!"
